snippet: Journalists should not be jailed in Tehran to score political points.
abstract: Editorial expresses outrage at continued detention of Iranian-American journalists Jason Rezaian and his wife Yeganeh Salehi by Iranian authorities; contends it is indefensible that Iran's hard-liners are jailing journalists in order to embarrass Pres Hassan Rouhani.
lead_paragraph: Journalists should not be jailed in Tehran to score political points.

headline.main: An American Reporter’s Detention in Iran
headline.print_headline: An American Reporter’s Detention in Iran
